overview: Nea is in danger of losing her daughter: First Nations, single and poor, she places no trust in a legal system that has taken thousands of First Nations children away from their families. Morgan's erotic photographs have been seized by the cops: as a lesbian involved in the anti-censorship struggle, she is starting to feel a bit jaded. A mutual friend, Helena, introduces Nea to Morgan and their lives collide. Layered with special effects and poetic writing, this video-drama documents a historical moment in feminist and anti-racist organizing in Canada.
title: Night Visions
